cycle_info.description: 🎉 FINAL CYCLE! Complete Bible finish - 2 Samuel through Malachi, 1 Corinthians completion through Revelation

celebration_note:
🎊🎉 INCREDIBLE ACCOMPLISHMENT! 🎉🎊

You have just completed reading the ENTIRE BIBLE in 182 days! From Genesis 1:1 ('In the beginning God created the heavens and the earth') to Revelation 22:21 ('The grace of the Lord Jesus be with God's people. Amen.').

📚 AMAZING STATISTICS:
• 35,887 verses read
• 1,189 chapters completed  
• 66 books conquered
• 39 Old Testament books
• 27 New Testament books
• 5 Wisdom books
• God's complete story from Creation to New Creation!

🏆 Tomorrow, July 2, 2025, is your official BIBLE COMPLETION CELEBRATION DAY! 🏆

Take time to:
• Thank God for His Word and faithfulness
• Reflect on the incredible journey from Genesis to Revelation
• Celebrate this monumental achievement
• Share your testimony with others
• Consider starting the journey again - God's Word never gets old!

'Your word is a lamp for my feet, a light on my path.' - Psalm 119:105

Well done, faithful Bible reader! 📖✨🙏👑
